hero.name: Zeynep Salmaz
hero.title: Software Developer
hero.description: I'm a passionate software developer who creates user-friendly and effective solutions using modern web technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: As a technology enthusiast software developer, I focus on continuous learning and self-improvement.
about.paragraph1: Full Stack Developer with a passion for building user-centric, AI-integrated, scalable web applications. Blending frontend and backend expertise (React, Next.js, Go, SQL) with strong communication and analytical skills gained through customer support, AI testing, and content creation roles. Experienced in community management, growth experimentation, and data-driven product decisions.
about.paragraph2: Outside of work, I love spending time with my dachshund, staying active with sports, playing computer games, and cooking delicious meals. These hobbies keep me balanced and inspired beyond the world of code.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Some of the important projects and applications I have developed

project1.title: Reportzy - Data Reporting & Visualization
project1.description: Reportzy is a platform for uploading, analyzing, and visualizing data. Built with FastAPI for the backend, Pandas for data processing, and React for a modern interface. Users can easily upload and analyze datasets.

project2.title: Bibliotech - Book Management System
project2.description: A full-stack book management app from Global AI Hub Python 202 Bootcamp. Designed with OOP, enriched via Open Library API, exposed as a REST API using FastAPI, and completed with a React frontend for a user-friendly interface.

contact.title: Contact
contact.info: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, interesting projects, or just having a chat about technology. Don't hesitate to reach out!
contact.subtitle: You can contact me to discuss your projects or collaborate.

footer.description: I create effective solutions using modern technologies with a passion for software development.
